heading: Terrapin |2013 | Editors 1 - FINAL | 9 | Science | Physics | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Since no element has a stable isotope with atomic mass of 5 or 8, this process can only occur at temperatures above 100 million kelvins, so that beryllium-8 forms elements faster than it decay. For 10 points each: [10] Name this process that involves three helium-4 nuclei combining to form a carbon-12 nucleus.
